column1: ,Fuse_410,2012-09-29T02:58Z,"Would be nice if you indicated which films are included, if they are Rifftrax or iRiffs, and what kind of quality we should expect."
,OnlineOni,2012-09-29T03:52Z,"Fuse - You can click ""files"" up top and see fire names and sizes for any torrent on TPB.  Don't give the guy crap for not knowing that.
Speaking of giving crap:  hey man, seed this out!  We're waiting to get this going."
,ShadowWolf87,2012-09-29T04:07Z,"Ah, sorry about that. Kinda noobish to the whole thing."
,lindz85,2012-09-29T22:36Z,"i wouldn't download this, this guy has no other torrents on this site, has no reputation and doesn't even provide what movies are included. seems sketchy to me."
There's a link right up top with the file list, if you're that paranoid about it."
Fantastic Four - Rise of the Silver Surfer Rifftrax.avi
Rifftrax - Captain America The First Avenger 2011.mkv
RiffTrax- X-Men Last Stand - Dual Audio .mp4
Here's my problem: this should be released as individual films, not a massive 18 GB torrent that no one wants to seed."
,OnlineOni,2012-09-30T19:27Z,"At this point I'm wondering if the uploader is aware that he has to seed this out.  I've been connected since there were 4 peers, and I haven't received a single byte.
I'll leave it going for a bit longer, see if it starts."
